mapper.select: SELECT courseId FROM course WHERE userId = #{userId} AND courseName = #{courseName} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course (userId, nickname, courseName, color, regDate, modifyDate) VALUES (#{userId}, #{nickname}, #{courseName}, #{color}, #{regDate}, #{modifyDate})
INSERT INTO course_detail (courseId, location, x, y, visitDate, memo, userId) VALUES ( #{courseId}, #{location}, #{x}, #{y}, #{visitDate}, #{memo}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT cd.* FROM course_detail cd JOIN course c ON cd.courseId = c.courseId WHERE c.courseName = #{courseName} AND c.userId = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM course_detail WHERE courseId = #{courseId} AND location = #{location}
